title: One Minute Mandarin - Special Announcement
description: We're delighted to announce that the premium version of One Minute Mandarin is now available. This includes a pdf lesson guide featuring all the words and phrases covered in the course, and an introduction to reading and writing in Chinese; enhanced podcasts showing the words and phrases on the screen of your computer/iPod as you listen; bonus listening materials including a quiz podcast and the special "Take-Off Time" show - 20 minutes of review which you can take with you on the plane to China.

author: network@radiolingua.com (Radio Lingua Network)
